title: Riot explain yourself.
body:
Why is the project sync event up and running (i just had a project yasuo on my team, it showed) 
but the skins arent out. 

r u just teasing us

replies.body: The new PROJECT: skins will be coming out shortly! ^-^
If you could stop teasing me it would be great.

Heythere, do you know If Project Yasuo will go on sale along with the other skins? :v

also,please.
PROJECT: Yasuo is 50% off.

waitwaitwait

Why is it okay for the skin to be on sale so players can get it for less than other players did, but it's not okay for that skin to get the special loading screen like the others because they'd get it for less than other players did?
PROJECT: Yasuo is older, which is why we're okay with putting him on sale. PROJECT: Yasuo, while a PROJECT: skin, isn't part of this particular promotion.
Yasuo needed a border and because he doesn't I cant buy these skins yet, my ocd wont allow it
More than I expected! Thanks a dozen!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=cWrnK5Tl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-08T21:17:28.314+0000)
>
> The new PROJECT: skins will be coming out shortly! ^-^

Katey,  new Shen skin please =(

http://www.auplod.com/u/auopld60eff.png
But what kiiiind?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=cWrnK5Tl,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2015-09-08T21:32:19.567+0000)
>
> But what kiiiind?

I prefer 1350 RP and up, would be great if he's able to get a legendary skin.....Also make it unmasked, since Akali and Kennen has couple unmasked skins but not Shen.

http://www.auplod.com/u/auopld60eff.png

> [{quoted}](name=D Bag,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=cWrnK5Tl,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2015-09-08T21:35:05.138+0000)
>
> I prefer 1350 RP and up, would be great if he's able to get a legendary skin.....Also make it unmasked, since Akali and Kennen has couple unmasked skins but not Shen.
> 
> http://www.auplod.com/u/auopld60eff.png

Something like this?

http://m.youtube.com/watch?v=pOTRhgAZ6Tw

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=cWrnK5Tl,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2015-09-08T21:32:19.567+0000)
>
> But what kiiiind?

Surprise Party Shen. His Qs throw balloon animals, a clown nose honks every time he lands a taunt, and a cloud of confetti flies out of his ult targets when he arrives.
Trollface shen.  Every time he ults in and saves someone, a trollface pops up on screen.
Spectral shen!! idk.... just want you to notice me Q_Q
an unmasked Shenpai costing 1350 RP

Why not make a shen skin that was futuristic cyberpunk style
Also why not make a tron themed skin for gnar it could be cool

Any information about what time the Project skins will be coming out? :)
I'm ready to empty my wallet.
They're out.~ :D
:D:DD:D:D:D:DD:D:DD:D:D:D

Rito teasing us again. 
disable store right when they come live
Any news yet? It's already 09/09 technicaly :c *throws wallet at monitor* (sorry for bad english!)
